Update Information. Your name will appear in contributors.

I like Janta Malik app,
- Citizens can easily connect with MP/MLA
- See where govt is spending tax-money?

Saansad Duties 
1. Ask my questions and get answer from govt 
2. Put my points in debates in Parliament 
3. Share the govt spending and policies with me
Optional \nAttending weddings, parties, public functions and social media
Salary 2.7 lakh per month (including allowances) \nTwo lakh seventy thousand rupees
You are welcome to donate or join the team for next version
